disclaimer: Disclaimer: The following information is not professional architectural advice. Please consult a certified architect or local building authority for accurate design and construction details.

rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious reception area with direct access to the living areas and staircase, ensuring seamless flow from the entrance. Includes a waiting area and coat closet.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open concept living space designed for relaxation and social gatherings, incorporating large windows following Vastu principles for natural light. Features a central seating arrangement with flexible partitions to create zones as needed.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An integrated dining area adjacent to the kitchen, allowing easy service during meals. Designed to maintain an open flow within the living space.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen area placed strategically near dining area to ensure efficient workflow and adherence to local building norms.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated office space with ample natural light, soundproofing, and built-in storage for work materials. Located in a quiet corner following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Private living area provided on the ground floor to accommodate domestic staff, including a bedroom and small kitchenette with basic amenities.

openings.description: A robust steel door consistent with Brutalist design aesthetics. Includes security features.

openings.location: Various rooms including living area and home office
openings.description: Large openings ensuring ample natural light while maintaining thermal efficiency as per local norms.
